item.title: Report X-2025031196
item.description:
Report X-2025031196

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 3/13/2025 at approximately 1900 hours, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 104644 at the station location in Maspeth, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of one padded envelope that contained 3 bottles of spray-on deodorant. The shipment was discovered to have the trademark rattling sound in aerosol containers. Further inspection confirmed the commodity as an undeclared aerosol shipment. The package was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations, missing the required markings, labeling, packaging and paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an investigation by the FAA.

item.title: Report X-2025031179
item.description:
Report X-2025031179

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: HAUPPAUGE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 03/13/2025 at approximately 1800 hours, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 4060191 at the station location in Ronkonkoma, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of 4 fiberboard boxes, each containing multiple bottles of retail cologne and perfume. One bottle from one of the boxes appeared to leak; cause unknown. While including a Shipper's declaration, the package did not appear to have the required markings or labeling attached. The entire shipment was improperly prepared and has been rejected during inspection.
